title: Axiom Constraint Validation Domain (ACVD) Schema
description: Defines the externalized constraints governing P-01 calculus and DSE parameters, guaranteeing deterministic configuration baseline for GSEP-C (S01).

ACVD_VERSION.description: Semantic versioning of the ACVD schema payload.

P01_CRITERIA.description: Constraints directly dictating the P-01 PASS resolution (Section 3.0).

MIN_EFFICACY_THRESHOLD_OMEGA.description: The configured minimum TEMM score (Î©_min) required for P-01 PASS.

MAX_ALLOWABLE_UTILITY_DEBT_LOGS.description: Maximum number of ADTM logs permissible within a cycle before IH.

ECVM_VALIDATION_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Maximum time allowed (in milliseconds) for ECVM state resolution before IH.

ALLOW_ZERO_MPAM_VIOLATIONS.description: If TRUE, any resulting MPAM entry triggers an automatic P-01 FAIL, enforcing zero-tolerance governance.

GSEP_BEHAVIOR.description: Operational constraints for the GSEP-C and failure protocols.

IH_IMMEDIATE_ROLLBACK_REQUIRED.description: If TRUE, Integrity Halt (IH) triggers mandatory Rollback Protocol (RRP) instantly.

IH_MAX_ATTEMPTS_BEFORE_FREEZE.description: Maximum number of RRP attempts before the system enters a hard freeze/manual inspection state.
